items.sentence: You're the first person I've met who used to live in Boston.
Tom was caught stealing toilet paper from a public restroom.
That's not the main reason that Tom ought to have done that.
When will you find out whether you passed the course or not?
Tom doesn't drink much nowadays, but he used to drink a lot.
It looks like you haven't been taking good care of yourself.
I'm planning to spend more time studying French from now on.
Tom reached for a dictionary that was on the very top shelf.
I'm pretty sure Tom doesn't want to go to Australia with me.
Didn't you know Tom was planning to go to Australia with me?
